title: Nike Men's Dri-FIT Legend Training T-Shirt - Black - Size M
description: The Nike Men's Dri-FIT Legend Training T-Shirt in Black is engineered for optimal performance during workouts and for casual wear. Featuring Nike's Dri-FIT technology, this t-shirt efficiently wicks away sweat to keep you dry and comfortable. Its lightweight and breathable fabric, coupled with a classic fit and ribbed crew neck, ensures a comfortable experience whether you are training or simply lounging. Ideal for those who seek both style and functionality in their athletic wear.
key_features: Classic fit with a ribbed crew neck
meta_title: Nike Men's Dri-FIT Legend Training T-Shirt - Black - Size M
meta_description: Shop Nike Men's Dri-FIT Legend Training T-Shirt in Black for superior performance and comfort. Featuring sweat-wicking Dri-FIT technology and a classic fit, perfect for workouts and casual wear. Available in Size M.
